nodes.text: Shag Kava, also known as the Shag Kava Band, was a traveling band consisting of four members—Infrablue Zedbeddy Coggins, Sudswater Dillifay Glon, Ubert "Sticks" Quaril, and Taybin Ralorsa. In the year 34 ABY, Shag Kava performed the songs "Jabba Flow" and "Dobra Doompa" in the castle of Maz Kanata on the planet Takodana.
Shag Kava first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. Although the band was not identified in the film's dialogue, they were named in the credits.
